title: Explanation- (i) the minimum clearance as above shall be measured from the maximum sag for vertical clearance and maximum deflection due to wind pressure for horizontal clearance
clause_text: Explanation- (i) the minimum clearance as above shall be measured from the maximum sag for vertical clearance and maximum deflection due to wind pressure for horizontal clearance.
section: Height restrictions in the vicinity of aerodromes
